items.name: Treetop Canopy Glamp
items.short_description: Experience the rainforest like never before in luxurious, elevated tents with breathtaking ocean views. Perfect for nature lovers seeking comfort and seclusion.
items.address: Road to Manuel Antonio National Park, Quepos, Puntarenas

items.name: Quepos Bean-to-Bar Experience
items.short_description: Discover the journey from cacao and coffee bean to delicious finished products. Enjoy interactive tours, tastings, and learn about sustainable farming practices at this new educational farm.
items.address: Finca La Esperanza, 3km East of Quepos Town Center, Quepos, Puntarenas

items.name: Jungle Rapids Adventure Park
items.short_description: Thrill-seekers rejoice! Experience white-water rafting, extreme ziplining, and rappelling down waterfalls in this brand new adventure hub nestled in the lush jungle.
items.address: RÃ­o Savegre Sector, Ruta 235, Quepos, Puntarenas

items.name: Quepos Mangrove Paddles
items.short_description: Explore the intricate waterways of the Damas Island mangroves by kayak or stand-up paddleboard. Discover diverse wildlife, including monkeys and birds, in a serene, eco-friendly tour.
items.address: Estuary entrance near Damas Island, Quepos, Puntarenas

items.name: El Mercado de Arte Quepos
items.short_description: A vibrant new marketplace showcasing the best local art, handmade crafts, and unique souvenirs from Quepos and surrounding regions. Meet the artists and take home a piece of Costa Rica.

items.name: Tierra Viva Cocina
items.short_description: Savor authentic Costa Rican flavors with a modern twist at this new farm-to-table restaurant. Participate in hands-on cooking classes to learn local recipes using fresh, organic ingredients.
items.address: 500m North of Marina Pez Vela, Quepos, Puntarenas

items.name: Pura Vida Sunset Sail
items.short_description: Embark on Quepos' newest luxury catamaran for a spectacular sunset cruise. Enjoy open bar, gourmet snacks, and breathtaking coastal views of the Pacific.

items.name: Quepos Wildlife Sanctuary & Visitor Center
items.short_description: A newly opened center dedicated to rescuing and rehabilitating local wildlife. Take an educational guided tour to learn about conservation efforts and meet the resident animals, including sloths and monkeys.
items.address: 7km from Quepos on Road to Dominical, Quepos, Puntarenas

items.name: Vista Azul Infinity Hotel
items.short_description: Perched on a hillside, this sleek boutique hotel offers unparalleled ocean vistas from its stunning infinity pool and private balconies. A new standard for luxury relaxation in Quepos.
items.address: Hillside overlooking Manuel Antonio, Quepos, Puntarenas

items.name: Green Waves Surf School
items.short_description: Learn to surf or rent eco-friendly boards at Quepos' newest sustainable surf school. Certified instructors offer lessons for all levels on the beautiful local beaches.
items.address: Playa Espadilla North, Manuel Antonio, Quepos, Puntarenas
